verses.roman:
yata nindā kare tāhā prabhu saba jāne
tathāpi ādara kaṛe baḍa-i sambhrame

synonyms: yata—whatever; nindā—blasphemy; kare—does; tāhā—that; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saba—all; jāne—knows; tathāpi—still; ādara kare—offers respect; baḍa-i sambhrame—with great attention.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu knew that Rāmacandra Purī was criticizing Him before everyone, but whenever Rāmacandra Purī came to see Him, the Lord offered him respects with great attention.
